text: Tagi dauwa aamua o Assyria ga duudagi adu hua ana helekai boloo, “Holongo goodou e hai mai gi di au bolo goodou e hagadagadagagee gi Dimaadua di godou God? Ma go nia gowaa hagalabagau a Dimaadua mono gowaa dudu tigidaumaha ala ne oho go Hezekiah i di madagoaa a mee ne helekai gi digau Judah mo Jerusalem bolo gi daumaha hua i di gowaa dudu tigidaumaha dela i Jerusalem.
